answers.author: Alexandra Iannolo
answers.text:
Hello,
I found some resources that you may find helpful as a start.
This report from the Municipal Technical Advisory Service goes over performance measurements for municipal public works departments.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/14810/MTAS_Technical_Bulletin__April_3_2007
I have also included some articles by the ICMA Center for Performance Measurement with case studies from different public works projects.
Reuse and Recycling
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/7704/What_Works_2002_Refuse__Recycling
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/302975/What_Works_Sample_Solid_Waste_Case_Study
Highway & Road Maintenance 
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/6547/What_Works_2002_Highway__Road_Maintenance_Chapter
Fleet Maintenance
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/7582/What_Works_2002_Fleet_Maintenance_Chapter
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/302967/What_Works_Sample_Fleet_Management_Case_Study
This article details how benchmarking was used in the Kansas City Public Works department.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/4125/Kansas_Citys_Public_Works_Benchmarking_Experience
This is a sample Quarterly Performance Measurement spreadsheet from the Washoe County, NV Division of Public Works.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/14827/Quarterly_Performance_Measures
Ali Iannolo
Knowledge Network Intern
aiannolo@ICMA.org
